name.ja: ドラゴニック・エスケープ

requirement.en: When a monster on your field is destroyed by an opponent's attack or their card effect.

effect.en: Special Summon 1 "Gaia the Dragon Champion" or 1 Level 5 or lower Dragon Type monster from your Graveyard face-up to your field. This turn, the monster Special Summoned by this effect cannot be destroyed by your opponent's card effects.
